bug.summary: [BUG] Tests are failing due to the use of a deprecated field in pandas
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
Unit tests are failing due to the use of a deprecated field in pandas. <denchmark-h:h3>In which platform does it happen?</denchmark-h>
Both Windows and Linux. <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the issue?</denchmark-h>
Run unit tests (Linux/Windows CPU/GPU) <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
Tests should be updated to make our code compatible with future versions of pandas <denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>
